content: पुलकः {@--1@} Erection or bristling of the hairs of the body, a thrill (of joy or fear), horripilation; चारु चुचुंब नितंबवती दयितं पुलकैरनुकूले <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; मृगमदतिलकं लिखति सपुलकं मृगमिव रजनीकरे <ls n="Gīt.">7</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 57</ls>, <ls n="Amaru.">77.</ls> {@--2@} A kind of stone or gem. {@--3@} A flaw or defect in a gem. {@--4@} A kind of mineral. {@--5@} A ball of food with which elephants are fed (गजान्नपिंड). {@--6@} Yellow orpiment. {@--7@} A wine-glass. {@--8@} A species of mustard.
